[NEAT-924] ðŸ—’Read Files (#1153)

# Description

In addition, added skipping of files that have `instanceId` set. These
have a counterpart in DMS that should be ingested instead.

## Bump

- [ ] Patch
- [x] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Added

- Support for reading file metadata.
`neat.read.cdf.classic.file_metdata(...)`
